name: Petri Dish Simulator 2017
description:
Petri Dish Simulator was created during the LudumDare 38 (21-23 April 2017) with @Poli_ssonne and Yann. The Theme was "A Small World"

You have to manage your own small world of bacteria. Try to have a lot of it, but beware, they can break their own world. Maybe you could find a way to solve the overpopulation issue of Earth with this experiment ?

Sources : https://github.com/Fangh/LDJam38

Ludum Dare Project page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/petri-dish-simulator-2017

⚠️ If you want to play in your browser, I deliberately put the game in a small window so you have to click the Full Screen Button to play ⚠️
